name: Chronicles of a Game Dev Student
name_original: Chronicles of a Game Dev Student
description: #gjgdcjam Part RPG, Puzzle game, reaction game and Shoot em up! Play as the new student in the Design Academy. Go to class, complete homework, and work on your game! You've got 30 days before the big Game Developer test, and you'll need every bit of help to face the "final boss"! This was a solo project. It uses some free licenced music
